entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
